author: TheMaster
releaseNotes: presence code rewrite. Detection for 3320-L working diffrent than 1116-S. Auto adjust for min bat voltage. You must let bat run down to 0 one time.

drivers.name: Iris v2 Contact Sensor-custom
drivers.description: Iris v2 contact sensor with presence. Automatic bad battery detection presence, iMagic by GreatStar 1116-S & CentraLite 3320-L
